sentences.en: Her story is sharply evocative of Italian provincial life.
sentences.cn: 她的故事鲜明地唤起意大利乡村生活的回忆。

sentences.en: Her new book is wonderfully evocative of village life.
sentences.cn: 她的新书唤起人们对乡村生活的美好感情。

sentences.en: All these items in the knapsack are evocative, and what they do is suggesting a plot.
sentences.cn: 背包里的所有物品都能唤起人们的回忆，而它们所做的就是暗示一个情节。
